report.title: Point samples list
report.description: A list of the point samples (effort and sightings points) for a survey
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN samples tr on tr.id=s.parent_id -- transects JOIN surveys su ON su.id=s.survey_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id=s.id and sav.deleted=false and sav.sample_attribute_id=#record_type_attr_id# JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=sav.int_value #joins# WHERE s.deleted=false AND tr.parent_id = #parent_sample_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: transect_sample_id
param.description: Optional sample ID for transect to show

param.name: record_type_attr_id
param.description: Attribute ID for the sample type

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
